display_name: Immediate-release CCBS = NFIR or DIHIR or VERIR or DLTIR (SHHS1)
description: Participant taking IMMEDIATE-RELEASE CCBS = NIFIR OR DIHIR OR VERIR OR DLTIR within two weeks of the SHHS1 visit.  All medications were recorded during the interview, and medication information was later categorized by physician review.
